body.text: 567 Judo club win medals at the Chalfont Championship, hosted by the Chalfont and Evreham Judokwai
Third place (Bronze medals) for Gabriel and Harry
Videos of FiveSixSeven Judo players now available on YouTube

article.title: 567 Judo club Members attend Southend international

body.text: 567 Judo players attend the 4th Southend International Judo Championships.
Members of the club faced some stiff opposition with a very high standard of Judo displayed throughout
More pictures and videos to follow
